1.title: The Truth Behind the Shattered Glass
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A young man leads a group of college students on a scientific mission to become to control the time space continuum and become terrorists in the process. But when NASA gets word of his activity and invites him to join their side to defeat parasites that are invading earth, the group defends humanity and their own lives take a twist.
imdb.title: Escape Velocity
